segments.text: Excuse me , but can I draw on my account for payment of things I buy in China ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , sir . How much do you draw ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: RIB 8,000 , please . Would you please tell me my balance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . Your balance is RIB 34,000 .
segments.speaker: S2
